original_text: Trust ye not in lying words, saying, The temple of the Lord, The temple of the Lord, The temple of the Lord, are these.
korean_text: 너희는 이것이 여호와의 성전이라, 여호와의 성전이라, 여호와의 성전이라 하는 거짓말을 믿지 말라

sentences.original_text: Trust ye not in lying words
saying, The temple of the Lord
The temple of the Lord, are these
